AT.name: Moco Moco Friends
AT.description: Moco Moco Friends ist eine spannende Variante eines Adventure-RPGs. Entwickle deine Fertigkeiten und sammle haufenweise knuddelige Monster, um der ultimative Plushkin Master zu werden! Kämpfe gegen deine Rivalen, plündere Gegenstände, wage dich in riesige Dungeons, entwickle deine Plushkin-Monster und reise mit deinen Gefährten durch das magische Reich von Dreamtopia!

AU.name: Moco Moco Friends
AU.description: Moco Moco Friends is an exciting twist on the adventure RPG genre. Build your skills and amass loads of cuddly monsters to become the ultimate Plushkin Master! Battle against your rivals, scavenge items, venture through massive dungeons, evolve your Plushkin monsters, and travel with your companions across the magical realm of Dreamtopia!

BG.name: Moco Moco Friends
BG.description: Moco Moco Friends is an exciting twist on the adventure RPG genre. Build your skills and amass loads of cuddly monsters to become the ultimate Plushkin Master! Battle against your rivals, scavenge items, venture through massive dungeons, evolve your Plushkin monsters, and travel with your companions across the magical realm of Dreamtopia!

BE.name: Moco Moco Friends
BE.description: Moco Moco Friends est un passionnant jeu d'aventure de type RPG. Développez vos compétences et accumulez les monstres en peluche pour devenir le maître incontesté des Plushkins ! Combattez vos adversaires, récupérez des objets, aventurez-vous dans d'immenses donjons, faites évoluer vos Plushkins et parcourez le royaume magique de Dreamtopia avec vos compagnons !

ES.name: Moco Moco Friends
ES.description: Moco Moco Friends da una vuelta de tuerca emocionante al género de aventuras RPG. Mejora tus habilidades y acumula muchísimos monstruitos adorables para convertirte en ¡el mejor maestro de Plushkin! Lucha contra tus rivales, busca y recoge objetos, adéntrate en enormes mazmorras, haz evolucionar a tus monstruitos Plushkin y ¡viaja con tus compañeros por el reino mágico de Dreamtopia!

IT.name: Moco Moco Friends
IT.description: Moco Moco Friends è un'appassionante novità nel genere avventura-GdR. Potenzia le tue abilità e ammassa montagne di mostri coccolosi per diventare il Plushkin Master definitivo! Affronta i tuoi rivali, recupera oggetti, avventurati in sterminati dungeon, fai evolvere i tuoi mostri Plushkin e viaggia con i tuoi compagni nel magico reame di Dreamtopia!

NL.name: Moco Moco Friends
NL.description: Moco Moco Friends is een spannende nieuwe kijk op het avonturen RPG-genre. Ontwikkel je vaardigheden en verzamel een hoop schattige monstertjes om de ultieme Plushkin meester te worden! Ga de strijd aan met je rivalen, roof items, baan je een weg door gigantische kerkers, laat je Plushkin monsters groeien en trek met je vrienden door het magische rijk van Dreamtopia!

NZ.name: Moco Moco Friends
NZ.description: Moco Moco Friends is an exciting twist on the adventure RPG genre. Build your skills and amass loads of cuddly monsters to become the ultimate Plushkin Master! Battle against your rivals, scavenge items, venture through massive dungeons, evolve your Plushkin monsters, and travel with your companions across the magical realm of Dreamtopia!

PL.name: Moco Moco Friends
PL.description: Moco Moco Friends is an exciting twist on the adventure RPG genre. Build your skills and amass loads of cuddly monsters to become the ultimate Plushkin Master! Battle against your rivals, scavenge items, venture through massive dungeons, evolve your Plushkin monsters, and travel with your companions across the magical realm of Dreamtopia!

PT.name: Moco Moco Friends
PT.description: Moco Moco Friends acrescenta um toque interessante ao género RPG de aventuras. Reforça as tuas capacidades e coleciona montes de monstros fofinhos para te tornares no derradeiro mestre dos Plushkin! Luta contra os teus rivais, procura objetos, aventura-te em vastas masmorras, desenvolve os teus monstros Plushkin e viaja com os teus companheiros no reino mágico de Dreamtopia!

RU.name: Moco Moco Friends
RU.description: Moco Moco Friends – это увлекательный поворот в жанре приключенческих РПГ. Развивайте свои навыки и призывайте массы симпатичных монстриков, чтобы стать самым крутым Мастером Плюшек! Сражайтесь с соперниками, добывайте трофеи, исследуйте громадные подземелья, развивайте своих плюшко-монстров и путешествуйте вместе с соратниками по волшебному царству Дримтопии!
